description: Learn Python while mastering magical arts at an enchanted academy

school: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

layer_2_universal.CELEBRATION: Well done, wizard! Your magic grows stronger with each spell mastered!
layer_2_universal.OPENING_FLAVOR: Your wand is ready, and the magical world awaits your command!
layer_2_universal.CLOSING_FLAVOR: You've mastered these enchantments! The magical realm is safer for your achievements.

introduction.CONTEXT_INTRO: Welcome to {{school}}! Your magical education continues with today's lesson.
introduction.CONTEXT_PROJECT_INTRO: Your first assignment: create a personal spellbook using Python dictionaries.
introduction.CONTEXT_ROLE_INTRO: You are the newly appointed Inventory Keeper at {{school}}.
introduction.CONTEXT_WORLD_INTRO: Welcome to Advanced Magical Systems class! Today you'll build an ecosystem where wizards and magical creatures interact.
introduction.CONTEXT_SPEC_INTRO: Professional spellcrafters never start coding without a proper spell specification.
introduction.CONTEXT_AUDIT_INTRO: Even if a spell works, it may not be worthy of publication in the Grand Grimoire.
introduction.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_INTRO: Advanced students learn to predict spell effects without casting them first.
introduction.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_INTRO: {{mentor}} has challenged your class to compare two approaches to spell organization.
introduction.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_INTRO: Oh no! Several spells at {{school}} have been sabotaged!
introduction.CONTEXT_UNLOCKING_INTRO: At {{school}}, advanced magic is taught in stages. You must master each level before unlocking the next.

learning.CONTEXT_LEARNING_OBJECTIVE: You'll learn how to structure spell formulas using Python data structures.
learning.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_PURPOSE: This crucial skill prevents dangerous magical accidents.
learning.CONTEXT_WORLD_VISION: Your code will simulate real magical dynamics between wizards and creatures.

narrative.CONTEXT_EXAMPLE_NARRATIVE: Here's how {{mentor}} teaches the {{spell1}} enchantment to first-years:
narrative.CONTEXT_INCREMENTAL_NARRATIVE: Like all great wizards, you'll start simple and expand your grimoire over time.
narrative.CONTEXT_SPEC_NARRATIVE: {{mentor}} has written the requirements for a new defensive spell. Your job is to implement it.
narrative.CONTEXT_CODE_SAMPLE_NARRATIVE: A first-year student submitted this working spell, but {{mentor}} rejected it for poor style.
narrative.CONTEXT_INTERACTION_NARRATIVE: When a wizard encounters a creature, the outcome depends on both entities' properties.
narrative.CONTEXT_VERIFICATION_NARRATIVE: Compare your predictions with the actual spell outputs.

tasks.CONTEXT_STUDENT_TASK: Now craft your own spell using the same pattern you've studied.
tasks.CONTEXT_ROLE_RESPONSIBILITIES: Your job is to track all magical items, supplies, and equipment used by students and staff.
tasks.CONTEXT_ROLE_CHALLENGE: The previous keeper's records are in chaos! You must organize everything using proper data structures.
tasks.CONTEXT_SITUATION_SETUP: It's the morning of September 1st. Hundreds of students are arriving, and they're all asking for their supplies!
tasks.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_MISSION: As a member of the Spell Debugging Squad, you must identify what went wrong and restore each spell.
tasks.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_DECISION: Two senior students have proposed different spellbook structures. Which is better for our needs?
tasks.CONTEXT_SPEC_CONSTRAINTS: Note: Shield spells cannot block more than 5 threat types at once (magical limit).

guidance.CONTEXT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA: Your spell should have name, power, and effect properties - just like the example.
guidance.CONTEXT_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDANCE: Start by creating the basic structure, then add each property one at a time.
guidance.CONTEXT_ANALYSIS_PROMPT: As an apprentice spellcrafter, evaluate both approaches and defend your choice.
guidance.CONTEXT_DECISION_GUIDANCE: Consider: simplicity vs. organization, current needs vs. future growth.
guidance.CONTEXT_IMPROVEMENT_GUIDANCE: Rewrite the spell with clear variable names and proper documentation. Functionality should remain identical.
guidance.CONTEXT_UNLOCK_REMINDER: Uncomment the next stage when you've mastered the current one!

completion.CONTEXT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY: Run all exercises to see your spellbook come to life!
completion.CONTEXT_ROLE_COMPLETE: Excellent work, Inventory Keeper! The supplies are organized and ready for distribution.
completion.CONTEXT_PROGRESSION_STATUS: Check which stages you've completed. Unlock the next when ready!

quality.CONTEXT_AUDIT_STANDARDS: All spells submitted to the library must follow the {{school}} Code Style Guide.
quality.CONTEXT_ISSUES_FOUND: The spell functions correctly but violates several style principles:
quality.CONTEXT_SPEC_SOURCE: {{mentor}} has written the requirements. Your job is to implement them exactly.

phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_1: Every spellbook begins with a basic spell. Create a dictionary to store your first spell's properties.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_2: Now that your spell exists, practice accessing its power level and effects.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_3: Add more spells to your collection using the same structure.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_4: Learn to update and modify existing spells in your grimoire.
phases.CONTEXT_PHASE_5: Combine everything you've learned into a complete spell management system.

cases.CONTEXT_CASE_1_NARRATIVE: {{friend}} tried to cast a potion spell, but it crashed with a KeyError.
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_1: Examine the potion dictionary. What key is the code trying to access? Does it exist?
cases.CONTEXT_CASE_2_NARRATIVE: A levitation charm is producing strange errors when calculating lift power.
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_2: Check the data types. Is the code trying to do math with a string?
cases.CONTEXT_CASE_3_NARRATIVE: The automated brewing cauldron won't stop! It's been stirring for hours.
cases.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_3: Look at the loop condition. Will it ever become False?

stages.CONTEXT_STAGE_1_NARRATIVE: Every wizard begins here. This simple spell is safe for beginners.
stages.CONTEXT_UNLOCK_INSTRUCTION_1: Complete this stage before moving on.
stages.CONTEXT_STAGE_2_NARRATIVE: This intermediate spell builds on Level 1 concepts.
stages.CONTEXT_STAGE_3_NARRATIVE: Only those who've mastered the basics may attempt this advanced magic.

challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_1_NARRATIVE: {{friend}} has written a spell that levitates three objects. What will it announce?
challenges.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_1: Read line by line. What does each print statement output?
challenges.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_2_NARRATIVE: This spell sorts students into houses. Predict the house assignments.

approaches.CONTEXT_APPROACH_1_NARRATIVE: {{friend}} prefers keeping all spell data in a single-level dictionary.
approaches.CONTEXT_APPROACH_2_NARRATIVE: {{heroine}} argues that grouping related properties in nested dictionaries is clearer.

entities.CONTEXT_ENTITY_1_NARRATIVE: Wizards are the primary magic users. Each has a name, power level, and list of known spells.
entities.CONTEXT_ENTITY_2_NARRATIVE: Magical creatures can be befriended or battled. Each has a name, type, and disposition.

hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_HYBRID_INTRO: The entrance to {{school}} has been sabotaged!
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_HYBRID_OVERVIEW: You'll decode the error, fix the bug, then implement a complete solution.
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_HYBRID_COMPLETE: The gates are secure once more!
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_PART_A_NARRATIVE: {{mentor}} shows you the broken spell. What went wrong?
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_PART_A_TASK: Read the error message and explain what's causing it.
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_PART_B_NARRATIVE: Now that you understand the problem, fix the immediate bug.
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_PART_B_TASK: Correct the syntax error in the authentication spell.
hybrid_exercise_blocks.CONTEXT_PART_C_NARRATIVE: With the bug fixed, implement a complete access control system.
